document.topic_text: ​Topshop unveils exclusive collection for Net-A-Porter Topshop’s first High Summer collection, created exclusively for Net-A-Porter.com, has launched online. The 20-piece High Summer collection launched globally on April 22 - Topshop The 20-piece range is inspired by the rowing event Henley Royal Regatta, which is held once a year on the River Thames in England, and other British summertime traditions.Mannish suiting, classic khaki denims and cable knits are included in the assortment, as well as dainty Georgette dresses and blouses, and boat shoes in leopard pony skin.Kate Phelan, Creative Director, Topshop says: “We continue to use our heritage of British style and culture to bring to life new season shapes for the High Summer collection, yet focus on what is familiar and signature to the Unique handwriting.”“April kicks off the British summertime and we really wanted the first ever capsule with Topshop Unique to be a celebration of this,” says Sarah Rutson, Vice President of Global Buying, Net-a-Porter. “We love the tough femininity that the collection imbues. I’m excited to be bringing this to our global customer.”The exclusive capsule collection costs from £55 - £275 and is available on both Topshop.com and Net-a-Porter.com.
